page.title: 16BILLERICAY NW Schools 1.
page.content: The area was once served by 2 primary schools but the new estate has necessitated expansion.{Brightside {Primary School}was built in 1971 and a separate Infant School established in 1975.{Buttsbury Primary School,} founded 1930, developed as two separate schools in 1967. An overlap is due to end in 1985. Brightside Infant/Junior Schools cater for 331 children. Both are semi_open plan but flexible in their teaching methods. Parents are supportive and are involved in a variety of school activities with Infant children. Buttsbury Infants/Junior Schools cater for 732 children. These schools are organized on traditional lines. Parents organise social/fund raising events and play an active role in the Infants School.
